com.programmerdan.minecraft.banstick.handler

Class BanHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.programmerdan.minecraft.banstick.handler.BanHandler

  • public class BanHandler
extends Object
    A series of static utility classes to facilitate issuing bans.
    Author:
    ProgrammerDan

    • Method Detail

      • doUUIDBan

        public static BanResult doUUIDBan(UUID playerId,
                                  boolean adminBan)
        Issues a ban against a specific UUID. If the player is online, kicks them. This uses the default message. See doUUIDBan(UUID, String, boolean) for custom message, or doUUIDBan(UUID, Date, boolean) for end time, or doUUIDBan(UUID, String, Date, boolean) for both.
        Parameters:
        playerId - The UUID of the player to ban.
        adminBan - Was this admin ban or automatic?
        Returns:
        A summary of who was banned.

      • doUUIDBan

        public static BanResult doUUIDBan(UUID playerId,
                                  Date banEnd,
                                  boolean adminBan)
        Issues a ban against a specific UUID. If the player is online, kicks them. This uses the default message but a custom end time.
        Parameters:
        playerId - The UUID of the player to ban.
        banEnd - The time the ban should end.
        adminBan - Was this admin ban or automatic?
        Returns:
        A summary of who was banned.

      • doUUIDBan

        public static BanResult doUUIDBan(UUID playerId,
                                  String message,
                                  boolean adminBan)
        Issues a ban against a specific UUID. If the player is online, kicks them. This uses a custom message.
        Parameters:
        playerId - The UUID of the player to ban.
        message - The message to display when a player attempts to rejoin.
        adminBan - Was this admin ban or automatic?
        Returns:
        A summary of who was banned.

      • doUUIDBan

        public static BanResult doUUIDBan(UUID playerId,
                                  String message,
                                  Date banEnd,
                                  boolean adminBan)
        Issues a ban against a specific UUID. If the player is online, kicks them. This uses a custom message and end time.
        Parameters:
        playerId - The UUID of the player to ban.
        message - The message to display when a player attempts to rejoin.
        banEnd - The time the ban should end.
        adminBan - Was this admin ban or automatic?
        Returns:
        A summary of who was banned.

      • doIPBan

        public static BanResult doIPBan(BSIP exactIP,
                                String message,
                                Date banEnd,
                                boolean adminBan,
                                boolean includeHistoric)
        Issues a ban against an IP address. After the ban is created, finds all accounts that are using the IP address and bans them, unless already banned or pardoned.
        Parameters:
        exactIP - The IP address to ban.
        message - The message to use as a ban message; is also sent to all players who are online and caught in the ban.
        banEnd - When does the ban end?
        adminBan - Was this an administrative ban?
        includeHistoric - Ban everyone who has ever used this IP address?
        Returns:
        A BanResult object describing who was banned.

      • doCIDRBan

        public static BanResult doCIDRBan(BSIP cidrIP,
                                  String message,
                                  Date banEnd,
                                  boolean adminBan,
                                  boolean includeHistoric)
        Does a ban against a CIDR range.
        Parameters:
        cidrIP - cidr IP range to ban
        message - Message to record as ban reason
        banEnd - The time to end the ban
        adminBan - Is this an administrative ban?
        includeHistoric - Should we include all historic occurrences of this IP in the ban? (TODO)
        Returns:
        A BanResult with the bans issued, if any

                                   BSPlayer limitBanTo,
                                   String message,
                                   Date banEnd,
                                   boolean adminBan)
